summary: Backend testing of Notification Queue System extension completed. All 15 tests passed (100% success rate). Queue processor is running, EscrowNotificationIntegration is loaded.
critical_code_review_comments: GET /api/notifications/queue/stats returns pending_in_queue and total counts
GET /api/notifications/queue/failed returns paginated list with messages, total, page, pages
POST /api/notifications/queue/{id}/retry correctly returns 404 for invalid IDs
GET/PUT /api/notifications/preferences working with sms, whatsapp, email, preferred_channel fields
NotificationQueue and EscrowNotificationIntegration are loaded successfully (confirmed via logs)
Queue processor runs every 15 seconds in background
seed_data_creation: None - Tests use nonexistent IDs to verify 404 responses
context_for_next_testing_agent: Notification queue system tested and working. Queue stats, failed messages pagination, retry with 404 for invalid IDs, and preferences GET/PUT all functional. Queue processor runs every 15 seconds. EscrowNotificationIntegration hooks into order status changes. Previous iteration_14 tested templates, logs, transport partners, OTP verification, and tracking links - all working.

features_verified.GET /api/notifications/queue/failed: WORKING - Returns paginated {messages: [], total, page, pages}
features_verified.POST /api/notifications/queue/{id}/retry: WORKING - Returns 404 for invalid ID with {detail: 'Message not found'}
features_verified.GET /api/notifications/preferences: WORKING - Returns {sms: bool, whatsapp: bool, email: bool, preferred_channel: string}
features_verified.Notification queue processor: CONFIRMED RUNNING - Logs show 'Starting notification queue processor'
features_verified.EscrowNotificationIntegration: CONFIRMED LOADED - Logs show 'Notification queue and escrow integration loaded successfully'
